metadata.name: Arcade World: The Bidball
metadata.description:
[This piece has been minted as a bidders edition to thank all the bidders of the Arcade World auction by Bastien]

A long time before you had started visiting your favourite Arcade World in your city, there was only an empty warehouse. Full of hundreds of hundred years old spider webs, suspicious silence and ghostly atmosphere it was a place no sane kid would ever set their foot near, let alone in.

But things change. One day, a young entrepreneur, still young enough to know the struggles of a high school attender, decided to build something in this place.  
The rent was cheap, this is a small town after all and the warehouse had been vacant for a few years already.

He took all the cash he had and leased it, and with the money he had left, he bought this GM Pinball machine, unknowingly laying the foundation stone for happy childhood memories of countless of children.

This place was about to blow up, he just hadn't known back then yet.
